eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.identifiers

Class WauzRuneIdentifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.identifiers.WauzRuneIdentifier

  • public class WauzRuneIdentifier
extends java.lang.Object
    Typed identifier, used for identifying rune items.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    WauzIdentifier

    • Method Detail

      • identifyRune

        public void identifyRune(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                         org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack runeItemStack)
        Identifies the item, based on the given event. After setting the name, additional methods are called to roll rarity and tier. Then a random rune type is taken and added to the item's display name. Finally the new name will be set and the item lores are generated.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who identifies the item.
        runeItemStack - The rune item stack, that is getting identified.
        See Also:
        Rarity.getRandomRuneRarity(), Tier.getRuneTier(String), generateIdentifiedRune()

      • generateIdentifiedRune

        private void generateIdentifiedRune()
        Generates the rune, by calculating the might stat and setting lore, flags and meta. Rarity, tier and so on have to be set before calling this method. Plays an anvil sound to the player, when the identifying has been completed.
